t: For the director of music. With stringed instruments. Of David.
Hear*pn my cry, O God; listen*ld to my prayer.
From*pn the ends of the earth I call to you, I*ld call as my heart grows faint; lead*ld me to the rock that is higher than I.
For*ln you have been my refuge, a*ld strong tower against the foe.
I*pn long to dwell in your tent forever and*ld take refuge in the shelter of your wings.
For*ln you, God, have heard my vows; you*ld have given me the heritage of those who fear your name.
Increase*pn the days of the king’s life, his*ld years for many generations.
May*ln he be enthroned in God’s presence forever; appoint*ld your love and faithfulness to protect him.
Then*pn I will ever sing in praise of your name and*ld fulfill my vows day after day.
